title: "help me or i am afk"
body:
Seems to be a common bronze flame I encounter in my game. players will say things like ' if you dont help me im going to leave the lane" and its just so darn toxic. what are you suppose to do when a top laner or mid laner throws a game on purpose? are reports for this type of behavior moderated? or can it even be detected?  It's come down to turning off chat every single game... but where did this mindset even come from.

it seems every 2nd or 3rd game is trolled in my current rank. (silver 1 with bronze shit mmr, my other account "dat tito" is gold and has the same problems... Im just wondering if RITO has anything to say about these players. )
I've been playing garen and cant seem to carry these teams even with a good matchup.

cheers.

replies.body:
yesterday had a game where i was winning jungle, top was winning and mid was winning... but our adc was i think 1/8 at the 7 min mark and i asked her to stop fighting and just farm because every lane is winning
she said and i quote
"fuck you you dont help i keep fighting until you lose".

which is what we eventually did :/

Leaving lane and afk are two very different things. 

If I keep getting 100-0 dove consistently im leaving lane. It's the smart thing to do. You can't play or build safe enough these days when everyone snowballs like a riven on adderall. My lane opponent can either take the tower for free, or he can take tower for free and kills as well. At this point it's up to you how far he goes cuz I clearly can't stop him. I realize this isn't usually what you're faced with, but sometimes....

AFK is AFK and shouldn't be tolerated. Especially if they announce it.
I get ''report jg'' like every game, even if I explain why I'm doing so poorly in a civilized manner.

Join them, throw with them and hope the rest of your team joins in the dance in whatever bush yo want to dance in. Maybe the enemy team will join you and you can all have a 9 man dance off until the try hard comes to ruin it.
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
If you step foot in bronze, that is where you belong.

It's not offensive chat so let it go. People are allowed to ruin the match by being bad. Riot doesn't actually want to ban players, but they have to make some sacrificial offerings to appease the white knight witch hunters. By making it automated, they can stand behind an opaque wall of "no feelings from us, it's just the rules".
